alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 2:11PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts 70 to 80 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. The highest wind gusts are expected near Red Canyon on South Pass. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MDT Saturday. The strongest winds will occur between 10 AM and 4 PM. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation, particularly along Wyoming Highway 28 over South Pass. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive, and keep both hands on the steering wheel in case of a sudden strong wind gust.
